flow.descriptionCdata:
7056855c-b34c-44d5-b690-5054f432e8db.012eef56-9968-408b-8815-71f7960f5fda.description=Set the case count for "Open" cases to be 0 7056855c-b34c-44d5-b690-5054f432e8db.06ec0656-dd4c-4508-9f24-90ecc1454fda.description=
This subflow was created by the Web Services Wizard to invoke the findOpenCasesByInstProdAndStatus operation on http\://biz4da.savvis.lab\:18030/oss-ticket-core-1/TicketServiceBean?wsdl. Note that the inputs to this flow which correspond to web service inputs are optional inputs.  This is due to the fact that web services definitions usually incorrectly indicate that too many inputs are required, and mirroring those settings in the flow would force you to enter unused values when running the flow.  The xmlTemplate input on the Invoke Method 2 step of this flow contains a template of the xml message to be sent, and the fields preceded by the comment "<\!--Optional\:-->" or "<\!--zero or more repetitions-->" are those which the web service indicates are optional; all others are indicated to be required.

Inputs\:
host - The host that is running the web service
port - The port on the host running the web service
ProductId - The input named findOpenCasesByInstProdAndStatus|ProductId of the complex type\: findOpenCasesByInstProdAndStatus
 Ex\: 3259261
Status - The input named findOpenCasesByInstProdAndStatus|Status of the complex type\: findOpenCasesByInstProdAndStatus
 EX\: 'Open - Solving','Open - Customer Hold','Open - Pending Internal Fix','Open - Pending Vendor Fix','Open - Pending WO','Open - Savvis Hold','Open - Pending Disco','Open - Auto Hold'

Responses\:
success - The SOAP command was accepted by the web service
failure - Something went wrong while making the SOAP request

Extra Results\:
document - The raw XML response of the web service
documentStripped - The XML response of the web service stripped of namespaces
CaseValues - The output given by the XPath\: /Envelope/Body/findOpenCasesByInstProdAndStatusResponse/CaseValues
7056855c-b34c-44d5-b690-5054f432e8db.0f3b8b27-9bbf-4faf-ac3a-ef9e657303db.description=If the case status is any of the below, then there is chance this case should NOT be considered as an "Open" case Open – Auto Hold Open – Pending Internal Fix Open – Pending Vendor Fix Open – Pending WO Open – Savvis Hold Open - Fixed 7056855c-b34c-44d5-b690-5054f432e8db.41ea8808-c813-4780-8ce1-4722e88b0eb0.description=
Checks to see if a string matches a specific rule.

Inputs\:
matchType - The type of match to perform.
toMatch - The string to check if matches another string.
matchTo - The string to match against.
ignoreCase - Boolean value for whether or not to ignore case during match.

Responses\:
success - The String matched.
failure - The string did not match, or something went wrong.
7056855c-b34c-44d5-b690-5054f432e8db.4b47443c-dab0-4a43-923a-31bac987c41c.description=
Evaluates several XPath expressions from 'parameters' against a given 'xml' and creates variables in the local context with the XPath values.
Each XPath expression result is treated as a string.
 
Inputs\:
xml - The xml (in the form of a String).
parameters - A Java properties file formatted list of variable names and corresponding xpath expressions.

Responses\:
success - Everything worked.
failure - Something went wrong.
7056855c-b34c-44d5-b690-5054f432e8db.500492a2-d7b2-4ff4-b072-92a29386f8c8.description=
This is an operation that does nothing, and can be used to display information to the user by editing the display tab. It can also be used for filtering flow variables by feeding them in as inputs, and filtering them on the results tab.

Inputs\:
field1 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field2 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field3 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field4 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.

Responses\:
success - this operation never fails.
7056855c-b34c-44d5-b690-5054f432e8db.6f43e5c6-c561-4f77-a172-78a2387aa492.description=
This is an operation that does nothing, and can be used to display information to the user by editing the display tab. It can also be used for filtering flow variables by feeding them in as inputs, and filtering them on the results tab.

Inputs\:
field1 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field2 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field3 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field4 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.

Responses\:
success - this operation never fails.
7056855c-b34c-44d5-b690-5054f432e8db.6f43e5c6-c561-4f77-a172-78a2387aa492.prompt=caseStatus-${caseStatus} caseId-${caseId} 7056855c-b34c-44d5-b690-5054f432e8db.83261053-2348-482d-99a5-a28c9d4eb044.description=
Checks if a number or word is greater than another number or word. Word comparison is case-sensitive in alphabetical order.

Inputs\:
value1 - the first value.
value2 - the second value.

Returns\:
value1 > value2

Responses\:
success - The boolean operation was evaluated to true.
failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false.
7056855c-b34c-44d5-b690-5054f432e8db.95d0b114-67d8-4e24-b443-9f94862657f4.description=A case should be ignored by the open case searching, if\: Case Status equals one of the following\: Open – Auto Hold Open – Pending Internal Fix Open – Pending Vendor Fix Open – Pending WO Open – Savvis Hold Open - Fixed Case Type equals "Incident" Case Subject equals the new case going to be created 7056855c-b34c-44d5-b690-5054f432e8db.ca2a2b34-06c5-42ed-96ad-41164452dbb6.description=Given the ticketId, return the ticket's "caseType" and "caseSubject" Input\: ticketId -- case ID ticketServiceHost -- ticket service host ticketServicePort -- ticket service port Return\: caseType -- case type, if the ticket is found caseSubject -- case subject, if the ticket is found errorMsg -- error info, can be the web service exception, or the web service returned invalid XML, or the ticket is not found 7056855c-b34c-44d5-b690-5054f432e8db.description=
Checks for open cases in Vantive. If an open case is found with status 'Open - Pending Disco' then return the case id (ticket) so that it can be updated in the synthetic event

Inputs\:
ProductId- installed component id of server

Outputs\:
journalEntry- Entry for the trap's journal when trap is rejected
ticket - case id of the case with status 'Open - Pending Disco' 

Responses\:
success - If everything went fine.
failure - If something went wrong.
7056855c-b34c-44d5-b690-5054f432e8db.e8c2045c-8b3b-42b1-8f81-a0890983485d.description=
Evaluates the given 'xpathExpression' and returns the results in a form of an Iterator. The 'type' field tells the users the type of xml result returned. Possible values for 'type' are\: [ELEMENT, ATTRIBUTE, TEXT, OTHER]. This powerful operation can be used to retrieve xml Elements, Attributes, Text or filter baised on element names, paths, attributes etc. The World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) organization provides the XPath specification (http\://www.w3.org).

Inputs\:
xml - The xml (in the form of a String).
xpathExpression - The XPath expression to evaluate.

Responses\:
has more - Another result was in the list, and has been returned.
failure - Something went wrong.
no more - No more results. This will only be returned once, then iteration restarts.

Returns\:
returnResult - Result evaluated from the XPath string provided.
attributeName - If an attribute is returned, the name of the attribute.
type - The type of the result.
flow.name: FindOpenCases_Remediation

scriptlet.name: Step:ShouldIgnore? Flow:FindOpenCases_Remediation (95d0b114-67d8-4e24-b443-9f94862657f4)

staticBinding.value: 'Savvis has received a trap for this installed component and has not attemped automated resolution due to open cases which are:'+char(10) + char(10) + '${cases}'

scriptlet.name: Step:CheckCaseStatus Flow:FindOpenCases_Remediation (0f3b8b27-9bbf-4faf-ac3a-ef9e657303db)

staticBinding.value: 'Open - Solving','Open - Auto Hold','Open - Pending Internal Fix','Open - Pending Vendor Fix','Open - Pending WO','Open - Savvis Hold', 'Open - Customer Hold','Open - Fixed','Open - Pending Disco'

scriptlet.name: Step:getTicketById Flow:FindOpenCases_Remediation (ca2a2b34-06c5-42ed-96ad-41164452dbb6)
Step:IncreaseCaseCount Flow:FindOpenCases_Remediation (6f43e5c6-c561-4f77-a172-78a2387aa492)
